query: (Doc_abstract: glioma^4 OR "Astrocytomas" OR "Ependymomas" OR "Oligodendrogliomas" OR Doc_title: glioma^4 OR "Astrocytomas" OR "Ependymomas" OR "Oligodendrogliomas") AND (Doc_abstract: BRAF^4 OR NS7 OR B-raf OR BRAF1 OR RAFB1 OR B-RAF1 OR Doc_title: BRAF^4 OR NS7 OR B-raf OR BRAF1 OR RAFB1 OR B-RAF1) AND (Doc_abstract: "treatment" OR "therapy" OR "surgery" OR "radiation therapy" OR "chemotherapy")
